website_summaries.verdict: Standing 9 inches tall and adorned with frosty ornaments, this real jewelry box is a fun and functional gift for anyone who adores the Frozen films.
pros: Build a Frozen-inspired and fully-functional jewelry box, with pretty icy details
cons: Best for kids ages 6 and older

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got a GREAT deal on this Frozen set! My daughter is going to be 7 this Christmas and this is perfect for her. She likes to build the lego sets and then break them apart only to never really be used again. This set allows her to save the set on her nightstand or dresser to use for her jewelry. Delivered on time, a great price, and just what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferL

customer_reviews.title: Coolest lego set ever! 6 yr old girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter put this together almost entirely herself and loved how she could twirl the horse and Elsa. She loved the jewelry that came with and the fact that you could lock the drawers to prevent them from opening up when carrying it around. She absolutely loved this, and I would definitely be interested if Lego came out with a bigger Jewelry box that held more (Girls & Boys) My son would love a Marvel one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Scaparro

customer_reviews.title: Legos
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 5 yr old granddaughter. She had it done in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lego's for our oldest grand daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Between "Lion King" and "Frozen 2" we had a wide variety of gifts for Christmas for our two grand daughter's! This Lego was put together by our grand daughter who is 5. The true magic of the "Jewelry Box" was our little grand daughter doing it herself! It's so perfect for her.....She loves Elsa and anything which has Elsa's picture on it.....well she likes it immediately! It is nice to see a little girl enjoy toys that thrill her! So sweet.
customer_reviews.author: merm

customer_reviews.title: Another wonderful and innovative kit
customer_reviews.text: Our girls really love this kit. Not only does it have their favorite characters from Frozen II, but it's a jewelry box and comes with some plastic rings they can wear. The water horse spins thanks to gears built into the kit and there is even a small mirror! They built it themselves with no adult help, which is also a bonus for tired and busy parents. The colors are attractive and there's even a working drawer for the girls to keep their own jewelry. Glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Kid KyotoTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to see it together!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 7 year old granddaughter. The box was in perfect condition which is important (in my opinion) when giving items as gifts. She along with her older brother love legos. If she has any problem getting it together he’ll be happy to lend a helping hand.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter thrilled with this Lego kit!
customer_reviews.text: We finished this Lego set today, and my granddaughter did it essentially all herself, following book directions. She is almost 8, and loved the process and the results. She has a "real" jewelry box at home, but is happy to have this one in her room at our house and will be bringing some earrings from home to add to the Lego rings. She loved the gears and the Elsa and horse figures, and how they moved. She loved the mirror and how the drawer slid in and out and locked into place. A big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Rave Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I had a feeling this would be worth the price, and boy is it ever! My niece was ecstatic to learn, upon putting this together, that it is a fully functioning jewelry box! It's amazing! Add in Elsa and her water spirit horse from the movie and you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift! My granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable! My granddaughter loves it! She was so excited putting it together! I bought it for her 8th birthday and she was too old for it! She put it together by herself and was very excited with it! Probably the best LEGO set I ever bought! She wants me to buy one for her cousin for her birthday! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: gadgetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This one was a little tricky for my 7 year old. Now she doesn’t want to take it apart to use for making other things. But she plays with it as it is a lot!! She doesn’t have a ton of legos so we are trying to build up her stock!! Trying to keep her busy during this quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Daughters are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: It was fun and easy to build, its elsa and the water horse so of course your child is going to love it. It came with some rings and they love that its a jewelry box as well so its not only a toy they can build but something they can keep in their room and use forever. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O

customer_reviews.title: A unique and fun gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters birthday. She loves anything that is related to the movie Frozen. I also purchased her a jewelry kit so that she could make her own Frozen jewelry. She can keep it in her Frozen jewelry box. It is something that she can use as a jewelry box and she can also take it apart and use the LEGOS to build other things, too.

customer_reviews.title: It has a usable drawer!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old daughter put this together with just a little bit of guidance from me. She loved it the drawer works great opens and closes smoothly. I really like this Lego model because it then works as a drawer store things.

product_meta.title: LEGO Disney Frozen II Elsa’s Jewelry Box Creation 41168 Disney Jewelry Box Building Kit with Elsa Mini Doll and Nokk figure for Creative Play (300 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Style:StandardThe LEGO Disney Frozen II 41168 Elsa’s Jewelry Box Creation makes a perfect gift or Frozen bedroom decor for fans of the Disney Frozen movies. This decorative jewelry box for kids is inspired by Elsa’s ice castle with snowflake decoration, and features a turntable function to make the Elsa mini doll and Nokk, a mythical water spirit, horse figure spin around and around. The jewelry box drawer itself has a lock function to keep kids' favorite bits and pieces safe inside. Plus, this toy jewelry box includes a mirror inside so kids can see how their Frozen jewelry looks on. This DIY jewelry box building set makes a great arts and crafts project for kids. The LEGO jewelry box comes with 2 LEGO toy rings and includes 2 Frozen characters from the movie: Elsa and a Nokk.
feature_bullets: Kids will love making their own Elsa Frozen II jewelry box to safely store all of their precious bits and pieces, such as their favorite Frozen jewelry. Plus, this Frozen set includes 2 LEGO toy rings locked inside!

This DIY jewelry box is a great arts and craft activity for hours of imaginative play. The finished jewelry box features a mirror, drawer and lock. Plus, it also includes a turntable for an Elsa mini doll and Nokk LEGO figure to spin around on.
This cool DIY craft lets boys and girls aged 6+ build a decorative jewelry box with 2 Frozen characters. It's the perfect holiday gift or birthday gift for pretend play or as Frozen decoration.

LEGO Disney Frozen II Elsa’s Jewelry Box Creation can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO building bricks for endless Frozen adventures. Kids can bring to life Frozen II or make up their own story.

When it’s fully built, this awesome 300-piece kids jewelry box measures over 9-inch (23cm) high, 5-inch (15cm) wide and 4-inch (12cm) deep and is the perfect Frozen bedroom décor for any Disney fan’s bedroom

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,129 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
